section.title: Introduction
section.para: Within these sections the alternative types of direct runoff models will be discussed together with the need for models of baseflow and losses. Consequently, the differences between lumped and distributed models will be presented inclusive of the differing needs for calibration information and the information produced. The need for conceptualisation of the catchment storage will be introduced Also discussed will be the concept of catchment storage as a lead-in to the next chapter.
